name: gatsby-plugin-dts-css-modules
description: GatsbyJS V3 plugin, which automatically Creates TypeScript *.d.ts files for your CSS Modules, no matter which CSS preprocessor (Sass, LESS, Stylus etc.) you are using.
author: Jens Duttke <github@duttke.de> (https://github.com/jens-duttke)

scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run check-outdated
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
